# Strategy: Ease Up on the Gas V2a (add a little nitro)
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/bfDWmOdCVXh1xHw92AdJ/details

**Complexity**: High (9/10)
**Description**: Success is scary. Let's hide from the scary market when we are way up.
       -- Jackal

A somewhat more aggressive version. 
       -- Proteus
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 13 assets:

• **Stocks**: QQQ, UVXY, XLK, VOOG, SPY, TECL, TQQQ, BSV, UPRO, TMF, VIXY, VIXM, QLD

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: Daily
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

